Package pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic

Class TextTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic.TextTransformer
  • public class TextTransformer
extends Object
    TextTransformer allows to perform a set of text based transformations on a given String. All transformations are guaranteed to work on english UTF-8 letters.

    This class handles following transforms:

    • ToUpper
    • ToLower
    • Capitalize
    • Invert
    • ReplaceNumbers
    • ReplaceAbbreviations
    • ReplaceFullWords
    • Exchange
    • DeleteDuplicates
    • ToLatex
    • ToEmoji
